hadiths.text: It was narrated that ‘Aishah said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) prayed in a Khamisah* that had markings on it. Then he said: ‘These markings distracted me. Take it to Abu Jahm and bring me an Anbijaniyyah.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب لِبَاسِ رَسُولِ اللَّهِ ـ صلى الله عليه وسلم ـ
chapter.eng-name: The clothing of the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ)
